channel.title: About on Selim Kuzucu

item.title: About
item.description: About Me I am an intern research scientist at Five AI (Bosch) Oxford Applied Research Center supervised by Dr. Kemal Oksuz and Dr. Puneet K. Dokania. Previously, I obtained by BS in Computer Engineering from Middle East Technical University where I was advised by Prof. Dr. Sinan Kalkan. I was also lucky enough to be an intern at University of Cambridge, Affective Intelligence and Robotics Lab under the supervision of Prof.

item.title: Contact
